name: Before and After School Program
description: Before School : Before school care at McCoppin is provided by the Richmond District Neighborhood Center (TRNC), daily from 7:30 AM to 9:15 AM. TRNC offers arts and crafts and games within a supervised classroom. McCoppin also has fee-based enrichment programs in the morning, such as Mandarin, Spanish, and more. - Financial aid is available. For more information visit LINK After School : Two after school care programs available: Out of School Time (OST) and The Richmond Neighborhood Cente (TRNC).
